messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What are modifiers that grant either a bonus die or a penalty die?
Modifiers grant either a bonus die or a penalty die.
You are a helpful assistant.
What action does a target that is aware of being fired upon take to present a more difficult target?
A target that is aware of being fired upon may react by diving for cover.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the requirement for diving for cover?
A Dodge roll
You are a helpful assistant.
What does the attacker get if they succeed in diving for cover?
One penalty die
You are a helpful assistant.
What does a character who dives for cover forfeit?
Their next attack
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a character with multiple attacks dives for cover?
They forfeit all of their attacks
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a character has used their attack this round?
They forfeit their attack in the following round.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an individual with multiple attacks dives for cover?
They forfeit all of their attacks, not just a single attack.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does cover protect a target?
It obscures the target, making the shot more difficult.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if a target breaks cover briefly?
Another character targeting the target may be allowed to shoot.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an individual with multiple attacks dives for cover?
They forfeit all of their attacks.
You are a helpful assistant.
How much of the target must be concealed for a one to get an additional penalty die?
At least half of the target
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the bonus die when a target is at point-blank range?
A bonus die
You are a helpful assistant.
Can a target fight back or dodge a Firearm attack?
No, they can only fight back or dodge a Fighting attack
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a target's defense if it breaks cover even briefly?
A target that breaks cover even briefly may be targeted by another character, if that character is holding their turn.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the bonus die awarded to the attacker when the target is at point-blank range?
The attacker gains a bonus die at point-blank range, within a fifth of the shooter's DEX in feet.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the aiming character if they take damage or move while aiming?
The advantage of aiming is lost if the aiming character takes damage or moves while aiming.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many bonus dies can the aiming character gain?
Only one bonus die may be gained by aiming.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the advantage of aiming if the aiming character takes damage or moves?
The advantage of aiming is lost.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of a target moving at full speed on the difficulty of hitting it?
A target moving at full speed (MOV 8 or more) is hard to hit; apply one penalty die.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to the difficulty of hitting a smaller target?
Smaller targets are harder to hit; apply one penalty die.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of reloading a machine gun on the process?
Allow two rounds to change a machine gun belt.
You are a helpful assistant.
How many rounds it takes to load two shells into any handgun, rifle, or shotgun?
One combat round
You are a helpful assistant.
How many rounds it takes to exchange a clip in a round?
One round
You are a helpful assistant.
How many rounds it takes to change a machine gun belt?
Two rounds
You are a helpful assistant.
How many shots can many handguns fire per round?
2 or 3 shots
